definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: It indicates that telomerase participates in the repair process of DNA injury induced by ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 推測端粒酶參與電離輻射誘導DNA損傷的修復。

sentences.english: The ionisation radiation has to each arrogant living thing eliminates the function.
sentences.chinese: 電離輻射對各種傲生物都有殺滅作用。

sentences.english: Nuclear radiation can cause ionization or excitation material, it is called ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 核輻射可以使物質引起電離或激發，故稱爲電離輻射。

sentences.english: The Ionization Total Dose Radiation Effects and Hardening Techniques of FPGA Microcircuit;
sentences.chinese: 目的評估長期小劑量電離輻射對晶狀體的影響。

sentences.english: People can get cancer from low doses of ionizing radiation, the kind released in a nuclear accident.
sentences.chinese: 人們可能會因爲核事故釋放的小劑量電離輻射而致癌。

sentences.english: These are nonionizing EMF of much longer wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 這些是非電離輻射，波長要長得多。

sentences.english: Are people normally exposed to ionizing radiation?
sentences.chinese: 人們是如何暴露在電離輻射下的？

sentences.english: Sound waves and visible light waves are other examples of non-ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 聲波和可視光波也是非電離輻射。

sentences.english: The radiation effects of the burn-in device differ from those of the non-burn-in device.
sentences.chinese: 這一作用會改變器件對電離輻射的響應。

sentences.english: Objective To observetheeffect of high -dose irradiation on ocular lens.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察大劑量電離輻射對晶狀體的影響。

sentences.english: Apoptosis is a major style of cell death induced by radiation.
sentences.chinese: 電離輻射所致細胞死亡的主要形式爲細胞凋亡。

sentences.english: International Commission on Non-Ionizing Radiation Protection (ICNIRP).
sentences.chinese: 1國際非電離輻射防護委員會。

sentences.english: Human beings are exposed to natural radiation on a daily basis.
sentences.chinese: 人類每天都暴露在電離輻射下。

sentences.english: To study the neoplastic transformation of human cells in vitro induced by alpha-particle irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究電離輻射在離體時誘發人細胞惡性轉化。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of long low-dose radiation on ocular lens.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估長期小劑量電離輻射對晶狀體的影響。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
